data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - CSX Transportation - GE C40-8
data.detailed_description:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE C40-8 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:

Night Lighting
Ditch Lights
Auto Running Numbers
Fan Animation
data.about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE C40-8 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:

data.short_description: This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE C40-8 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games. Features Include: Night Lighting Ditch Lights Auto Running Numbers Fan Animation
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
